TopicTitle: "Flight Report Window" - too big, and pops up too soon. Let me enjoy the crash for a bit!

Articles.Content:
This is one of those 'little things' that I'd like to see worked on.  I've been having fun trying to get a working plane built - and I have one flying well, just not landing well... and every time I crash?

Instantly a large portion of the screen is taken up by the 'pretentious' Kerman (Finger in the air 'I think that could have gone better') and I get to watch whatever parts are not hidden by the honking big pop-up spin and crash.

Let me enjoy that moment!  I KNOW it did not go well.

Maybe there's a toggle I'm not aware of... but I'd really like the parts to settle - and maybe the option to just sit and enjoy the shattered remains of my craft before hitting ESC and choosing what to do next.

/Suggestion

Edited March 11, 2023 by JoeSchmuckatelli
I agree with this. Maybe it should stay hidden while the crash is taking place and appear on-click.
I didn't realize it until you said it, but 1000% I agree.

KSP: Krashing Space Program (or Kerbals Sometimes Plummet)

It's made for crashing! Let us see the wreckage!
